    • areProblemCells

      public static boolean areProblemCells​(int idNumberFirst, int idNumberLast, char letterFirst, char letterLast)
      Parameters:
      idNumberFirst - id number of the first Cell
      idNumberLast - id number of the last Cell
      letterFirst - id letter of the first Cell
      letterLast - id letter of the last Cell
      Returns:

    • horizontalCheckShip

      public static boolean horizontalCheckShip​(TreeSet cellsOccupied, BoardForDefence boardForDefence)
      Parameters:
      cellsOccupied - cells to be passed as parameter for check if there is some ship on adjacent cells
      boardForDefence - Board for Defence where cells will be controlled
      Returns:
      true if it is possible to add horizontal ship(represented by cellsOccupied) to boardDefence

    • verticalCheckShip

      public static boolean verticalCheckShip​(TreeSet cellsOccupied, BoardForDefence boardForDefence)
      Parameters:

      boardForDefence - Board for Defence where cells will be controlled
      Returns:
